events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but the screen has multiple scratches and the keyboard keys are sticky. This is very disappointing.
The customer's report indicates a product defect due to visible scratches and sticky keyboard keys on the laptop.
Customer case assigned to technical support agent Sarah M. for further assistance regarding reported product defect.
Hello, I am Sarah from support. I'm sorry to hear about the condition of your laptop. I will help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the affected keyboard area so we can assess the damage in detail?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches on the screen and the sticky keys on the keyboard. Let me know if you need more details.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know your preference, and we will arrange it immediately.
I appreciate the quick response. I would prefer a replacement because I need the laptop for work urgently.
We have processed your replacement order. The new laptop will be shipped within 24 hours, and tracking details will be shared shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the replacement laptop and that it meets your expectations. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
Since we have not heard back and your replacement has been delivered, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
